description:
Chase after the goods when the snow's pounding and the temperature's dropping. With a water-shedding face fabric, this jacket lets you keep cranking when you encounter coastal conditions. A smooth taffeta liner provides comfort and snag-free layering.

  • Made of H2No 2-layer polyester with a DWR finish to keep you dry during heavy snow
  • Insulated with polyester Thermogreen® (100% recycled), heavier in the torso for critical core warmth, and slightly thinner in the hood and sleeves for mobility
  • Interior lining helps control moisture
  • Helmet-compatible, adjustable hood has a laminated visor for visibility in bad conditions
  • High collar protects your neck even when the hood is down
  • Slim, watertight coated zippers
  • Webbing loops connect the powder skirt to compatible ski or snowboard pants to keep the snow out and the skirt down
  • Pit zips quickly release excess heat
  • Pockets include 2 handwarmer, 1 zippered outside pocket with a cord port, a pass pocket on the forearm, and inside drop-in and zippered pockets
  • Built-in Recco® Rescue System reflector allows ski patrol and mountain rescue teams to detect and locate Recco reflectors under snow. Useful for resort skiing, Recco technology is not a substitute for avalanche skills training, beacons, essential gear, or smart decision-making in the backcountry
name: Patagonia Insulated Powder Town Jacket - Men's
